document.description: Fast Food Restaurant ... Your order won't get screwed up and you won't have to wait ... Wendy's, Burger King, Bill Gray's Greece, Bill ...

McDonald's
820 Culver Rd , Rochester , NY 14609
Fast Food Restaurant Get directions (585) 288-1182 @mcdonalds mcdonalds.com See the menu

"... two minutes to the east ave mcdonalds. your order won't get screwed..." (2 tips) "the new drive thru is a pain in the ass at night for people..." (3 tips)
